titles.title: O God, I Need A Fresh And Living Word From You Today

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Chorus:
O God, I need a fresh and living Word from You today.
Please O Lord, don't let me miss a word that You might say.
I'm praying Lord, O let me see, O let me be
Alive in Thee-completely free,
I need Thee constantly.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
The Israelites received each day fresh manna from the Lord,
The gathering was daily thing, and it could not be stored.
Fresh manna every day by the Word of God's command
Kept all Israel fed until they reached the promised land.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
There were ten virgins going to wedding feast one night.
Five of them were wise and brought some oil for their light.
The other five were foolish, went to buy some, so they thought.
When they returned, He closed the door and said, I know you not.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Where are you today? Are things all going wrong,
Are you feeling weak while the enemy seems strong?
It sure has been a problem how such lies can fill our minds,
But Christ brings us victory, the rest is left behind.
